biotools.summary: VOLTA is a Python network analysis package, suited for different types of networks but with a focus on co-expression network analysis. The goal of VOLTA is to provide all functionalities needed for a comprehensive network analysis and comparison in a single package. Its aim is to expose all functionalities in order to allow users to build their own analysis pipelines and adjust functionalities as needed. Additional complete analysis pipelines are provided in the form of Jupyter Notebooks.
